title: Eames Style Office Chair EA219 Leather Grey
body: The Soft Pad Group Design of Charles Eames dates back in 1969. Similar to the design of the Aluminum Group in terms of both shape and construction, but the striking contrast created by the sewn-on cushions that creates an interesting contrast to the aluminum frame makes them stand-out. The Eames Office Chair EA219 has it all, high back chair and swivel mechanism. The EA219 guarantees style and comfort and makes working in the office easier. The high back provides ample support and delivers great comfort by adapting to fit the body snugly. Overall, this chair is makes it suited for management areas due to its dignified aura.
